INST1:
You are about to take part in an experiment in which you see letters at the center of the screen.  Different letters will be shown, and you must respond using the response option shown at the bottom of the screen to the letter 'X', but only when it comes immediately after an 'A'.  For example:
 A  ...  A  ... X    RESPOND
 A  ...  B  ... X    DO NOT RESPOND
 X  ...  A           DO NOT RESPOND

 You will see letters presented on the screen briefly.  Remember, ONLY RESPOND TO AN X, and ONLY WHEN IT IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWS AN A. Make a response to begin.
DEBRIEF: Thank you for participating in the experiment. Make a response to continue.
HEADER: Respond to 'X' only when it follows an 'A'
